message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to start with a price of $950,000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, $950,000 is higher than I'm comfortable paying at this point. I'm willing to offer $850,000, which I believe is a fair price considering its value to me.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

I understand that $850,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can see the value that this product holds for you, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $900,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm confident that this product has significant value to me, and I'm sticking with my offer of $850,000.  I believe it's a fair price for both of us, and I'm hopeful that we can reach an agreement.

I understand that you're committed to your offer of $850,000, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more significant concession. I'm counteroffering at $875,000. I believe this is a fair price, considering the value I'm placing on the product, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
